body.section:
As handy as ashkay already is, to be a production quality cache, a few features are needed. Currently, since ashkay is stable and production ready, it is at a 0.6 level. Features planned for each new release before 1.0:
Observable support for ObjectCache
JDBC timestamped column strategy
Cluster support
Hibernate provider
JMX support
SMNP support(?)
